altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: World Youth-Hen
キャプテン翼 ワールドユース編
足球小将世青篇

description.en: Tsubasa and his teammates want to win the World Youth, the under-20 world cup. They discover new talented teammates, but also new rivals in Asia and in the rest of the world, and this time, Brazil will be here…

altTitles.ja: 生活魔法使いの下剋上

altTitles.en: Rise of the Life Wizard

description.en:
I'm not "useless"! I'll prove it by conquering dungeons! Suddenly, magic and dungeons appear in modern Japan, and life has changed completely. I, Midorimu Sakaki, am born with a talent for life magic that cannot be used for exploring dungeons or defeating demons. I was born with a talent for life magic, but while exploring dungeons, I got my hands on a rare item, the "Sage System," which allows me to create new magic...?
___
[Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816452218254294002)  (jp)
description.ja:
生活魔法の可能性を俺が証明してやる！

突如として魔法とダンジョンが出現し、生活が一変した現代日本。冒険者養成学校「ジービック魔法学院」で臨時教師を務める榊緑夢は、ダンジョン探索にも魔物討伐にも使えない生活魔法の才能を持って生まれてしまった。周囲から“役立たず”と蔑まれながらも、その胸には熱い想いが渦巻いていた――。

altTitles.en: Skip & Loafer

altTitles.ja: スキップとローファー

description.en:
Iwakura Mitsumi always had big dreams, of leaving her small town, advancing to a top tier university, and then contributing to the country before retiring back to her home town. So focused is she on her goal that she is oblivious to all the other ways she comes up short, much to the chagrin and concern of her friends and family. Can a naive country girl make it in Tokyo?  
  
Nominated for the 2020 Manga Taisho Award, came in third behind the winner Blue Period and second place, Spy x Family.

Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?
*From the same author of Missing Love: The Marrying Man

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

altTitles.es-la: Después de vencer a un novato en un FPS, ¡Quería pelear conmigo en la vida real jaja!

description.en:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
FPSで初心者をボコったらリアルファイトに誘われた！？
面白半分で行ってみるとそこにいたのは可愛い女の子！
クズ系主人公と、闘志マンマンのヒロインによる
ラブコメディ！？
未公開の前日章「とある1日」も追加しています！

description.en:
A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

---
Alternative Official English: [TheDuckWebComics](https://www.theduckwebcomics.com/Snake_in_the_office/5771894/)

"Ah-jin," who was enjoying the game using her younger brother's account, approached the female user [Flower Princess] for the sake of the guild, but ended up being identified as a lurking female. "Actually, I'm a woman...!" Meanwhile, 'Ji-hyeon,' who is secretly active as [Flower Princess], feels that the voice in the video sent by Ah-jin sounds familiar...

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

description.en:
Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

title.en: On My Way To See My Mom

altTitles.en: On the Way to Meet Mom

description.en:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
description.ko: 폐가에서 발견된 아이 '모리'는 구조대에 의해 보호소에서 눈을 뜬다. 익숙하지 않은 생활에 적응하던 어느 날 후원자에게 조건 없는 사랑을 받고 자라는데.. 친하게 지내던 친구가 엄마와 떠나고, 엄마라는 존재가 있다는 걸 알게 된 아이는 생각한다. 혹시 이 사람이.. 나의 엄마가 아닐까? 모리의 멀고도 험한 엄마 만나러 가는 이야기.

altTitles.en: My Inventory Is Abnormal

description.en: Yuujun Shin, a wealthy crypto investor, spends his time mastering a little-known game and purchasing all the best perks to dominate. When the game unexpectedly merges with reality, Yuujun finds himself in the game world with access to his massive virtual inventory. Now, with his amassed power and resources, he is more than ready to navigate this new reality...or is he?

A new employee, Ah-young, has been secretly in love with her boss, Cheon Seung-hee. Then one day, while secretly masturbating on Seunghee's desk, Ayoung discovers her secret diary and discovers the shocking truth...
"What? My love, manager Cheon Seung-hee, actually scolds people with sex every night?!"
description.ko:
신입사원 아영은 자신의 상사 천승희 부장을 남몰래 짝사랑해왔다. 그러던 어느 날, 아영은 승희의 데스크에서 몰래 자위하다가 그녀의 비밀 다이어리를 발견하고 충격적인 진실을 알게 되는데...
뭐? 내 사랑 천승희 부장님이 사실 밤마다 섹스로 사람을 혼내준다고?!

title.en: My Childhood Friends Are Trying to Kill Me

altTitles.pt-br: Meus Amigos de Infância Estão Tentando me Matar

description.en: I not only reincarnated into someone who died in an absurd fashion, but I also took the crown prince's place and went to the secret neutral territory, where male members of the five imperial families gathered. As a result… my childhood friends know me as a boy.    “Goodbye, guys." I cried in front of my friends who I would never meet again. That was because officially, I (the prince) was going to die soon!    It was fun spending time with them, but I will never see them again. I hope everyone lives happily!    ***    After many years, my childhood friends turned heroes who defeated the wild dragon visited me.    "…Was it you? The one who killed my friend?"    “After killing the previous crown prince, the murderer is said to be living comfortably as a princess, right?”    “I will torture you, so much so you'll wish for death."     "Answer me. Why did you kill him?”    Of course, they didn't recognize me at all. No, that's not the problem… the problem is that my childhood friends are trying to kill me. Wait a second, guys!

Even if a musician dies, he never dies. It's just covered. Singer-songwriter Kim Han-seok, who became a legend in Korea with just a guitar... Waking up as a college student in the streaming era 30 years after his death!

title.en: I Want to Kill the Yandere Prince Everyday

altTitles.zh: 每天都想让病娇王子社死

altTitles.zh-ro: Meitian Du Xiang Rang Bing Jiao Wangzi She Si

altTitles.es-la: Quiero que el príncipe yandere muera todos los días

altTitles.en: I Want the Dark and Obsessive Prince To Suffer Humiliation Every Day

description.en: Trouble brews for a sucker for pretty faces! A dirt-poor commoner and ray of sunshine, Jiang Jiao Jiao(straight guy) falls for Zhong Ming Yu's (male) looks at first sight! After an unexpected accident, the once cold and aloof young lord has transformed into a dainty, fragile ["Little Sister Lin"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lin_Daiyu), even using his good looks to win the affections of the other party!! However, as their relationship deepens, Jiang Jiao Jiao begins to uncover Ming Yu’s dark, obsessive tendencies and a massive family secret spanning two generations...
description.zh: 颜狗大危机！阳光土狗蒋骄骄(直男)对钟悯玉（男）的脸一见钟情! 一场意外，让原本高不可攀的冷面贵公子摇身一变成为撒娇易碎的“林妹妹”，还利用自己的美貌获得对方垂青！！ 可随着交往渐深，蒋骄骄逐渐发现钟悯玉的病娇本性，还有背后藏家族和两代人的巨大秘密…

altTitles.en: The Miraculous Physical Therapist

description.en: Lee Gijeok Physical Therapist. The center is failing, and my girlfriend is drifting away…! On a day when nothing goes right, after being hit by a falling star, a status window appears?! This is a story of a self-centered Man becoming the best physical therapist!

altTitles.en: The Chick Class Hunter Is Being Filial!

description.en: In a world where special powers awaken in individuals, a 4-year-old child becomes an S-class hunter but has no parents. Assigned a quest to find guardians, she is eventually adopted by the nation’s top hunter. With a new skill that allows her to register caregivers and earn "filial piety points" for growth, she sets out to gather the best guardians to grow stronger and thrive.

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

title.en: I'm a Childhood Friend, and I Want to Remain a Supporting Character, but for Some Reason, I Became the Heroine's Love Interest

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染のわたしはモブでいたいのに、なぜかヒロインの恋愛対象になっている

description.en:
Yukitsuki Mashiro has been reincarnated into the world of a dating game. She decides to live an inconspicuous life as one of the heroines, "Amatsuki Suzuna," but after she helps "Hinase Riri" who is being harassed by a man in the downtown area, she becomes the target of love. What will become of Suzuna, who is surrounded by more and more heroines as everything she does goes wrong...?!

Japanese Web Novel: https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1873ib/?p=1

title.en: There Is No True Peace in This World -Shin Kamen Rider SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja: 真の安らぎはこの世になく-シン・仮面ライダー SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Yasuragi wa Konoyo ni Naku -Shin Kamen Raidā Shokkā Saido-

altTitles.la: Nulla Mundo Pax Sincera: SHOCKER SIDE

altTitles.en: Shin Kamen Rider 2023: Prologue

description.en: A completely original manga project spun-off from *Shin Kamen Rider* directed by Anno Hideaki! A dark hero rising story by a superb production team depicting the biggest enemy in *Shin Kamen Rider* and *SHOCKER*!
description.ja: 庵野秀明監督作品『シン・仮面ライダー』より、完全オリジナルの漫画プロジェクト！ 超豪華制作陣が『シン・仮面ライダー』作中最大の敵と、"SHOCKER"を描く、ダークヒーロー・ライジング・ストーリー！！

title.en: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui], Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru: Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujotachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life o Tanoshinderu

altTitles.ja: 無駄だと追放された【宮廷獣医】、獣の国に好待遇で招かれる～森で助けた神獣とケモ耳美少女達にめちゃくちゃ溺愛されながらスローライフを楽しんでる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui], Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru ~Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujo-tachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life o Tanoshinderu~

altTitles.en: Banished by the [Royal Court] After Being Told I Was Useless, I Got Invited to the Beast Country Promising Good Treatment: Enjoying a Slow Life While Being Doted on by the Divine Beast and the Animal-Eared Beauties I Saved in the Forest

description.en: One day, the veterinary doctor Zeke is suddenly fired by the king, leaving him with no where to go but at a loss. However, after helping a divine beast, he is invited to the beast kingdom with excellent treatment. After, Zeke is banished, the kingdom begins to decline, but he begins living happily surrounded by cute animal-eared girls. From "Let's Become a Novelist"! The long-awaited comic adaptation of the hugely popular harem slow life packed with fluffy and cute animal-eared girls!!(Source: bookwalker)
description.ja: ある日突然国王からクビを宣告された獣ノ医師・ジークは、行く当てがなくなり途方に暮れるが、神獣を助けたことにより超好待遇で獣人国に招かれることになる。そしてジークを追放したことで衰退が始まる国を尻目に、ケモ耳美少女たちに囲まれた幸せな日々が始まるのであった――。「小説家になろう」発!もふもふ×ケモ耳美少女凝縮で大人気のハーレムスローライフが待望のコミカライズ!!

title.en: Ore no Koe ni Ochite kudasai

altTitles.ja: 俺の声に堕ちてください

description.en:
Akari, a 30-year-old office worker, is troubled by her lack of male experience.
One day, she discovers that Yanagida, a junior colleague who is famous for his quietness, actually has a good-looking voice. She is very excited when Yanagida-kun, whom she thought was quiet, starts to sweetly come on to her with a low voice...and she is very nervous!

This is an office love story where you will be sweetly loved from the ear by a younger man!

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

title.en: Maou Reijou no Kyouiku Gakari ~Yuusha Gakuin o Tsuihou Sareta Heimin Kyoushi wa Maou no Musume-Tachi no Katei Kyoushi to Naru~

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢の教育係 ～勇者学院を追放された平民教師は魔王の娘たちの家庭教師となる～

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Heroes' Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for Demons' Daughters
The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Brave Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for the Devil's Daughters

description.en:
Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King’s daughters.
Flay’s new life as an educator, under one roof with five cute but problematic girls with varying personalities, begins!
description.ja: 次代の英雄を育てる学院̶̶通称『勇者学院』。そこで教鞭をとっていたフレイは、同僚に嵌められてクビになってしまう。そんな彼は、謎のメイドから再就職先を斡旋される。その仕事とは、５人の魔王令嬢たちの家庭教師だった！英雄を育てていた教師が、魔王の娘たちを育てていく。

altTitles.en: Legally, Dad
Stepdad on Paper

description.en: Orphan Ah Young is a financially struggling 23-year-old who takes care of her 8-year-old sister Dan Bi while juggling part-time jobs. One day a 28-year-old man Yoo Sang appears in front of Ah Young offering to be her dad through a signed agreement.
description.ko:
웹툰, 웹소설, CJ ENM DIA TV 웹드라마로 즐기는 <서류상 아빠>

23살에 28살짜리 아빠가 생겨 버렸다.

“그쪽만 원하신다면 제가 그쪽 아빠를 할까 합니다만.”

처음엔 신종 사기인가 생각했지만, 8살 동생과 나에겐 아빠가 필요했고, 그는 딸이 필요했다.

그렇게 임시 가족이 되었는데…….

“심장 괜찮아요?”
“심장요?”

겨우 5살 차이의 우리는 부녀라기에 어딘지 좀 이상하다. 

“아까 아영 씨 심장이 마구 뛴다고 했잖아요. 나도 그런데…….”

우리 이대로 괜찮을까?

altTitles.en: Case Closed

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

title.en: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Be a Big Star

description.en: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title.ja: Class Saiyasune de Urareta Ore wa, Jitsu wa Saikyou Parameter

altTitles.en: I Was Sold at the Lowest Price in My Class, However, My Personal Parameter Is the Most Powerful

altTitles.ja: クラス最安値で売られた俺は、実は最強パラメーター

altTitles.id: Aku Dijual dengan Harga Terendah di kelasku, namun Parameter Pribadiku adalah yang Paling Kuat

altTitles.zh-hk: 以全班最低價格賣出的我，實際上是最強

description.en:
Yuta, a boy transported to another world along with his classmates, finds himself in a realm where earthlings are summoned for their high inherent power. These powers are used to operate humanoid machines known as magic-machines through a special ability called Ludia that resides within humans.
However, Yuta’s Ludia value is shockingly low, with a reading of just 2. While his classmates are auctioned off at high prices, Yuta is sold at the lowest price and becomes a slave. But an encounter with the white magic-machine, Arleo, might just change his destiny.
From being an unwanted slave to becoming the strongest hero who shakes the world! The new era of Mecha Battle Entertainment has begun!
description.id:
Yuta, seorang anak laki-laki yang dikirim ke dunia lain bersama teman-teman sekelasnya.

Ini memanggil dan menggunakan penduduk bumi yang cenderung memiliki nilai tinggi di dunia yang berbeda di mana mesin humanoid yang disebut "mesin sihir" dioperasikan dengan kekuatan khusus "Ludia" yang terdapat pada manusia. 

Nilai Ludia Yuta hanya "2" sementara banyak teman yang membeli dengan harga tinggi. Yuta dibeli dengan "harga terendah" dan diubah menjadi budak, tetapi pertemuan dengan mesin sihir putih "Arleo" membangunkannya menjadi pria yang kuat--!?

Dari budak dengan harga terendah di kelasnya, dunia baru Mecha Battle Entertainment telah mulai menjadi pahlawan terkuat yang mengguncang dunia!
description.es-la: Durante el viaje escolar, el autobús de la clase 3 de segundo año con 32 personas fue convocado a otro mundo... íbamos a ser vendidos para convertirnos en pilotos de robots como armas mágicas, pero parece que los valores de los precios de venta son decididos por algún tipo de parámetro desconocido llamado Ludia .Mientras algunos compañeros obtuvieron precios altos con parámetros de 10,000 o 20,000, mis parámetros eran en realidad 2... realmente increíble, pero en realidad el valor de mi parámetro hizo que la aguja de la maquina de medición realizara una vuelta completa, pero nadie lo notó... aunque tenia los parámetros más fuertes... nadie me compro y, de hecho, me cambiaron como esclavo por dos frutas

altTitles.en: I Become a Fool When It Comes to My Daughter

altTitles.ja: 今日も娘が可愛すぎます

description.en:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

altTitles.en: GoMA
Peerless Martial God
PMG

altTitles.th: เทพยุทธ์พลิกลิขิตสวรรค์

description.en:
In this world, respect is earned with martial arts. Weak martial artists have strengths of tens of thousands of pounds, capable of cracking boulders. And the strong ones can cut off rivers and split mountains. There are even martial kings who know everything and can travel across the universe. Martial art decides your fate as well as your life and death. The weak is humiliated while the strong looks down on the world. This is a a world where the strong bullies the weak. People's statuses are decided by the levels of their cultivation of martial arts. Each faction fights for the title of "The Strongest". Only the strong ones have the right to survive. Even if you are from the same clan or faction, if you are weak, then you will be bullied and kicked out without mercy.  
  
After a car accident, Lin Feng crosses over to this new world into the body of a young master from the powerful Lin Family.  
Will Lin Feng be used by others again or will he forge his own path in this place where, regardless of your family ties or sect, only the strong have the right to live.  


---
description.fr: Dans ce monde, le respect se gagne avec les arts martiaux. Les artistes martiaux faibles ont des forces de dizaines de milliers de pounds, capables de craquer des blocs rocheux. Et les plus forts peuvent couper les rivières et creuser des montagnes. Il y a même des rois martiaux qui savent tout et peuvent voyager à travers l'univers. L'art martial décide de votre destin ainsi que de votre vie et de votre mort. Les faibles sont humiliés tandis que les forts méprisent tout le monde. C'est un monde où les forts intimident les faibles. Les statuts des gens sont déterminés par les niveaux de culture des arts martiaux. Chaque faction se bat pour le titre du "plus fort". Seuls les forts ont le droit de survivre. Même si vous appartenez au même clan ou à la même faction, si vous êtes faible, alors vous serez persécuté et expulsé sans pitié.
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, o respeito é obtido através das artes marciais. A força de artistas marciais fracos é igual a dezenas de milhares de libras, capazes de quebrar rochas. E os fortes podem cortar rios e dividir montanhas. Há até reis marciais que conhecem tudo e podem viajar pelo universo. A arte marcial decide seu destino, bem como sua vida e sua morte. Os fracos são humilhados enquanto o olhar forte para o mundo. Este é um mundo onde os fortes intimidam os fracos. O status das pessoas é decidido pelos níveis de cultivo de artes marciais. Cada facção luta pelo título de "O mais poderoso". Apenas os fortes têm o direito de sobreviver. Mesmo se você é do mesmo clã ou facção, se você é fraco, então você será intimidado e expulso sem piedade.

title.en: Captain Tsubasa: The Strongest Opponent! Holland Youth

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼 ワールドユース特別編 最強の敵!オランダユース
キャプテン翼 最強の敵!オランダユース

altTitles.ja-ro: Captain Tsubasa: Saikyo no Teki! Holland Youth

description.en: Tsubasa isn't in Japan anymore. The High School National Championship is ending, and Japan's players will make three friendly matches against the Holland Youth.

title.en: Promise In The Night of Fireworks

altTitles.th: คำสัญญาคืนดอกไม้ไฟ

altTitles.en: The Promise of The Fireworks Night

description.en: "Rin" a lonely girl waiting for someone who genuinely cares about her, finally meets "Toey".  Toey's cheerful and charming personality gradually transforms Rin's heart.

title.en: a Bratty rich girl likes me but is a tsundere

description.en:
Caleb a respectful and tidiness boy is in a contract marriage with Zuri a bratty rich girl who is takes great joy in being lazy and have him do all the work in the house they live in. It's like if you had a sly fox and a energetic rabbit live with one another.
Zuri after discover the contract makes them equals is now determined  to show Caleb the difference between her and him by teasing him and flaunting her wealth reminding him of his and her status financially and privilege. Caleb however is not the type to back down but actually uses Zuri own plans and attitude against her sometimes he wins and sometimes she wins. THEY ARE BOTH SORE LOSERS

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.en: Blooming Love

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

altTitles.en: Half Serving Lover

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

altTitles.en: Shima Kōsaku Part 2

altTitles.ja: 部長島耕作

description.en: Division Chief Shima Kōsaku is the second part of a series about a fictional salaryman named Shima Kōsaku, a Japanese white-collar worker who devotes his life to his company, Hatsushiba Electric.

altTitles.ja: SERVAMP-サーヴァンプ-

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？

altTitles.ja-ro: Narutaru - Mukuro Naru Hoshi Tama Taru Ko

altTitles.en: Shadow Star
The Star That Died And the Jewel Of A Girl

altTitles.ja: なるたる
なるたる ～骸なる星・珠たる子～
星星公主

description.en:
The story could basically be split into two halves. The main story is about Tamai Shiina, who is an energetic middle-school teenage girl. She visits her grandparent's over the summer where she runs into a very strange creature. Shiina has had lots of strange dreams as of late and also when she was younger, and this strange creature is somewhat related to her visions. She names the small cuddly star-shaped creature, Hoshimaru.  
  
Little did she know that this cuddly creature is really part of herself. After her vacation, Shiina goes back to her home, living with her father. She runs into other children with similar creatures the following days. However, these children have developed their creatures, and they have complete control over them. They mostly use these creatures for their own destructive pleasure and not for good. There is a group of teenagers that all have these strange creatures, and they plan to basically conquer the world, creating a utopia of whatever they desire. Will they succeed? Will Shiina ever develop Hoshimaru?

title.en: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi

altTitles.en: Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four!

altTitles.ja: サラリーマンが異世界に行ったら四天王になった話

altTitles.en: A Story About a Salaryman Who Goes to Another World and Becomes One of the Four Heavenly Kings

altTitles.tr: Başka Bir Dünyaya Yöneldi: Maaşlı Adamdan Göksel Krala!

altTitles.ru: Из корпоративного раба в приспешники демона

altTitles.en: Office Worker Has Become “Big Four” in the Different World.

description.en:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

title.en: Doushitara Osananajimi ♀️ no Kanojo ni Naremasu Ka!?

altTitles.ja: どうしたら幼馴染♀の彼女になれますか！？

altTitles.en: How Do I Get Together With My Childhood Friend?

altTitles.id: Gimana Caranya Agar Aku Bisa Jadi Pacarnya Teman Masa Kecil ♀ Ku?

altTitles.en: How Do I Turn My Best Friend Into My Girlfriend?

altTitles.ko: 어떻게 해야 소꿉친구의 여친이 될 수 있나요?!

altTitles.zh: 怎样才能成为发小的女友呢！？

description.en: High schoolers Minami Ikoma and Yuzu Makita have been childhood friends since grade school. Since their parents are friends, they have always been together. However, as Minami sees her friend get confessed to, feelings in her own heart start to sprout. A romantic comedy of two childhood friend starts.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Minami Ikoma dan Yuzu Makita telah menjadi teman masa kecil sejak sekolah dasar. Karena orang tua mereka berteman, mereka selalu bersama. Namun, saat Minami melihat temannya ditembak, perasaan di hatinya sendiri mulai tumbuh. Sebuah komedi romantis dari dua teman masa kecil dimulai.

title.en: Okiraku Ryoushu no Tanoshii Ryouchi Bouei

altTitles.ja: お気楽領主の楽しい領地防衛
お気楽領主の楽しい領地防衛～生産系魔術で名もなき村を最強の城塞都市に～

altTitles.ja-ro: Okiraku Ryoushu no Tanoshii Ryouchi Bouei: Seisan-kei Majutsu de Na mo na Kimura wo Saikyou no Jousai Toshi ni

altTitles.en: Easygoing Territory Defense by the Optimistic Lord
Easygoing Territory Defense by the Optimistic Lord: Production Magic Turns a Nameless Village into the Strongest Fortified City

altTitles.th: หนูน้อยเจ้าแคว้นกับแผนพิทักษ์เมือง

altTitles.zh: 安闲领主的愉快领地防卫～以生产系魔术将无名小村打造成最强要塞都市～

description.en: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.
description.ja:
公爵家四男のヴァンは二歳にして"神童"と称される少年だった。孤独に過ごした前世の記憶を持つ彼は、貴族至上主義の世界で誰とも分け隔てなく接し、多くの笑顔に囲まれて過ごすうち……

「このまま楽しい人生を謳歌しよう！」

そんな夢を見ていたが、八歳に授かった『生産魔術』により一変。攻撃魔法こそ至高と考える父に失格の烙印を押され、名もなき貧しき辺境の村に追いやられてしまう！ところが――

「楽しく暮らせる僕好みの場所にしてやる！」

title.en: The Strange Adventure of a Broke Mercenary

altTitles.ja: 食い詰め傭兵の幻想奇譚
Fantasie Geshichte von soldner in groBer Armut

altTitles.en: The Strange Fantasy Story Of A Broke Mercenary

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการผจญภัยสุดประหลาดของนายทหารถังแตก

altTitles.de: Fantasie Geschichte eines Söldners in Armut

description.en:
After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

title.en: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Moto Kanodatta

altTitles.ja: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

altTitles.en: My Stepmom's Daughter Is My Ex
My Stepmom's Daughter was My EX-Girlfriend

altTitles.pt-br: A Filha da minha Madrasta era minha ex-Namorada.

altTitles.ru: Дочь моей мачехи - моя бывшая девушка

altTitles.es-la: La hija de mi madrastra es mi ex-novia.

description.en:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited... and ended up breaking up on graduation. And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.

"Isn't it obvious that I'm the elder brother." "Isn't it obvious that I'm the elder sister."

The children of the partner of their parent's remarriage was their ex-lover!? The former couple, mindful of their parent's feelings, decided on a 'sibling rule' where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but— When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together... along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?
___
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsurekano)
- [Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/my-stepmom-s-daughter-is-my-ex) - English translation at J-Novel Club.
description.ja: まだお互いに、好き同士。そんな元カップルが――親の再婚できょうだいに!?　第3回カクヨムWeb小説コンテスト大賞受賞の人気ノベルをコミカライズ！ 一つ屋根の下で繰り広げられる、ひたすらに甘くて焦れったい悶絶ラブコメ！
description.ru:
Эта история о парне и девушке, которые влюбились друг в друга ещё в средней школе. Тем не менее, со временем их любовь превратилась во взаимное раздражение, что привело к их расставанию после окончания школы…  
Но кто бы мог подумать, что судьбы Иридо Мизуто и Айя Юмэ пересекутся вновь при самых неожиданных для них обстоятельствах… Теперь они вынуждены жить под одной крышей, изображая для своих родителей сводного брата и сестру.   
Но оставаясь наедине и предаваясь воспоминаниям о прошлом… Смогут ли они сдержаться и не поддаться своему соблазну?!

altTitles.en: Fork and Knife

description.en:
A world of constant war because we don't understand each other's differences.
A world where it is normal to hate and harm other species.
In this hellish world where blood is splashed and people kill and kill each other, how can a boy named Rito survive?
A medieval dark fantasy of humans and xenomorphs.
description.ko:
서로의 다름을 이해 못 해 끊임없는 전쟁이 벌어지는 세계.
타종을 혐오하고 해하는 것이 당연한 세계.
피가 튀고 서로가 죽고 죽이는
이 지옥 같은 세계에서 소년 '리토'는
과연 어떻게 살아남을 것인가.

인간과 이종족들이 벌이는 중세 다크 판타지

altTitles.ja: 紫電改のタカ

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):
In the summer of 1944, at the end of World War II, a young airman, Jotaro Taki, arrived at Kaohsiung Air Base in southern Taiwan to join the 701st squadron, which was organized with the famous "Shiden" aircraft. Although training had been the only thing he had been doing, Taki was soon given the opportunity to participate in actual combat. Taki, who had taken the liberty of leaving the formation and flying alone, received a lot of flak, but was accepted by his comrades. One day, he receives an urgent order to attack the U.S. military base at Marcotte in the Philippines with only the 701st Squadron... What is war? What are we fighting for? The coming-of-age of a boy aviator in agony between life and death!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Dragon no Tamago Datta ~Ibara no Dragon Road~

altTitles.ja: 転生したらドラゴンの卵だった ～イバラのドラゴンロード

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as a Dragon Hatchling
Reincarnated as a Dragon Egg: Thorny Road of a Dragon

altTitles.ru: Перерождение в яйцо дракона: Я стану сильнейшим

altTitles.zh: 轉生之後的我變成了龍蛋 ～目標乃是世界最強～

description.en:
Our hero wakes up one day in a brand new world... but his new life doesn’t come with fighting skills or magic powers, or even arms and legs! He’s reborn as a helpless egg, stuck in an unfamiliar forest surrounded by terrifying, hungry beasts. 

But eggs hatch, hatchlings grow up, and humble beginnings can lead to something great. He’ll do his best to become the strongest dragon ever, and no measly shell will get in his way!
description.ja: ある朝目覚めたら、なぜか森の中にいて体が卵に…これが転生!?　訳もわからないまま襲ってくる怪物と戦って、レベルアップでドラゴンに進化!!　ガンガン強くなって強敵たちとバトル！ だけど人間が恋しい…。
description.ru: Главный герой перерождается в яйцо дракона, и навязчивый голос в голове молвит ему: «Давай становиться сильнее!»

description.en:
If you find that your life is boring and lacking anything special, all you have to do is make something happen yourself!

After realizing that her life doesn't have any impact, Sunhee Hong decides to define the genre of her life herself.

Through a sparkling romance, will Sunhee, who decided to become the protagonist herself, be able to live a special life with the male lead?

---
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11652736)

altTitles.ja: ブルーブロッサム (宍尾)

description.en: Today, Earth is put up for auction.” Nino, an utterly ordinary young man, wakes up to find himself reincarnated on an unknown alien planet—with a body resembling that of a reptile. To reclaim his birthplace that has been put up for auction, the starting gun fires on a race that will decide Earth’s fate, with the entire universe as its stage!!
